title: Here's a curated list of 20 articles up to 2023 that focus on the evaluation of user interactions with natural language processing (NLP) models. These articles cover a range of topics including user experience, usability testing, human-AI interaction, and the effectiveness of NLP models in various applications
**"Evaluating the User Experience of Conversational Agents: A Review of Methods and Metrics"**
**"Human-AI Interaction in Natural Language Processing: A Survey"**
**"User-Centered Evaluation of Chatbot Effectiveness: A Case Study"**
**"Assessing the Usability of NLP Systems: A Comprehensive Framework"**
**"The Role of User Feedback in Improving NLP Models: A Review"**
**"Evaluating Conversational AI: Metrics, Methods, and Challenges"**
